name: Data Science Project-based Internship Home Credit Indonesia x Rakamin Academy
desc: Participated in a project-based data science program covering business understanding, data analysis, and machine learning and developed a model for loan prediction. The process involved exploratory data analysis to gain actionable insights for stakeholders, data preprocessing, feature selection for machine learning, and model training and hyperparameter tuning for predicting loan repayment success.

name: Data Science Bootcamp Rakamin Academy
desc: Participated in an intensive data science training program covering business understanding, data analysis, data manipulation, machine learning, deep learning, and building end-to-end systems. Collaborated with mentors and peers to create machine learning models predicting Airbnb room prices and build web applications for the final project. Our team was nominated as one of the top 3 teams to present in the final presentation in front of the Chief Technology Officer of Rakamin and the Data Manager.

name: UI/UX Design Project-based Internship Gamelab Indonesia
desc: Designed a responsive website aligning the user experience design. Created wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups to visualize and refine the design. Conducted usability testing to address pain points. Received full marks and positive feedback for the effective design solutions.

name: UI/UX Design Mentorship RISTEK University of Indonesia
desc: Engaged in a mentorship program focusing on user-centered design and prototyping. Collaborated with peers and mentors to create wireframes and usability tests for an educational platform, enhancing user engagement.
